articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Target-striking Contest of KPA Special Operation Forces
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Target-striking Contest of KPA Special Operation Forces
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A target-striking contest of the special operation forces of the Korean People's Army (KPA) to occupy islands took place on the Day of Songun, the 57th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, guided the target-strike contest.
					
					 He was greeted by KPA Vice Marshal Ri Myong Su, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Army General Ri Yong Gil, first vice-chief of the KPA General Staff and director of the General Operational Bureau, Army Col. General Pak Jong Chon, director of the Artillery Bureau of the KPA, and other commanding officers of the KPA at the drill ground.
					
					 The respected Supreme Commander heard a report on the program of the enemy target-striking contest at an observation post and issued an order to start the contest after going round the special operation forces which took up attack positions.
					
					 Airplanes which received an order for sortie ceaselessly hit hard the enemy targets.
					
					 And multiple-missile launchers of different calibers and self-propelled gun howitzers fired in salvo.
					
					 Shells hit the islands simulating Paekryong and Big Yonphyong islands.
					
					 A combat of the special operation forces to occupy the islands of the enemy started.
					
					 Combatants, who landed on enemy targets after dropping from light transports flying at a low altitude and infiltrated by stealth into the islands from underwater, rained fire at the enemy before they did not come to their senses.
					
					 Combatants who took rubber boats closed in upon the enemy camp and landed by surprise.
					
					 Combatants wiped out the desperate enemy with various combat methods.
					
					 Such enemy targets as the headquarters of the puppet 6th marine brigade and the headquarters of the unit for defending Yonphyong Island  situated on Paekryong and Big Yonphyong Islands were enveloped in flames in a moment and shouts of hurrahs rocked heaven and earth.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed great satisfaction over the successful target-striking contest.
					
					 Saying that the officers and men of the special operation forces are in high spirits, he highly appreciated the realistic organization of battle and commanding of drill true to the Party's policy of bringing about a radical turn in training.
					
					 What he regarded to be good in this contest is that formalism has been overcome in training and it has been put on a diversified and multilateral basis, he said, stressing the need for the officers and men of the special operation forces to focus on improving the quality of training and strengthen drills of arms and special arms and coordinated drills.
					
					 He said that in the future, too, the KPA should organize more drills simulating real battle for rounding off coordination among all services and arms, remarkably strengthen the combat capability in order to prepare for any forms of operational fields and combat conditions, and wipe out the strongholds of aggression where the enemy are entrenched once an order of attack is issued.
					
					 He noted that KPA should firmly adhere to the ideological and moral qualities peculiar to our revolutionary armed forces, which no other country's army can have, and should think of mercilessly wiping out the enemy with arms only and occupying Seoul at one go and the southern half of Korea.
					
					 He underlined the need to positively arouse the officers and men to the struggle to attain the KPA's goal for army building.
					
					 After the target-striking contest, the chief of the KPA General Staff announced the standing of the contest.

articles.title: Spokesman for Religious Believers Council of Korea Rejects U.S. 2016 Int'l Religious Freedom Report
articles.content:
Spokesman for Religious Believers Council of Korea Rejects U.S. 2016 Int'l Religious Freedom Report
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Religious Believers Council of Korea released a statement on Saturday in connection with the fact that shortly ago, the U.S. branded once again the DPRK as the "country specially suspected of religious freedom" seriously encroaching upon the "religious freedom" in its "2016 International Religious Freedom Report" and is massively spreading the public opinion against the DPRK.
					 The U.S. asserted in its "report" that the "freedom of religious belief" is specified in the DPRK's Constitution but, in fact, there is no "freedom" and it is mercilessly punishing religious activities. The U.S. also malignantly found fault with the DPRK, enumerating survey data fabricated by all shades of bodies organized by them.
					
					 The statement categorically rejected the report, branding it as the thing that does not deserve even a passing note.
					
					It recalled that during the last Korean war the U.S. savagely bombed and destroyed a lot of religious establishments such as more than 1,900 churches, cathedrals and Buddhist temples and mercilessly killed hundreds of thousands of innocent religious believers.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Such barbarities are being committed across the world. Many religious believers are losing their lives and time-honored holy places are reduced to debris by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' indiscriminate bombing. This is the true colors of the "religious freedom" much touted by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. much talk about the DPRK's non-existent" religious issue" is nothing but a last-ditch effort for tarnishing at any cost the international image and strategic position of the latter which is invariably advancing under the banner of independence against the U.S. ,and further fanning up the climate of sanctions and pressure against the DPRK.
					
					 The Religious Believers Council of Korea will as ever take a strong counteraction against the U.S. arbitrary practices and hostile policy toward the DPRK in solidarity with the international religious organizations.

articles.title: 30th Anniversary of Kyonghung Guidance Bureau Marked
articles.content:
30th Anniversary of Kyonghung Guidance Bureau Marked
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The Kyonghung Guidance Bureau of the DPRK observed its 30th founding anniversary.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il established it on Aug. 27, Juche76 (1987) and gave field guidance to various units under the bureau, leading it to make tangible contributions to improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 The bureau has performed feats, remaining loyal to the light industry policy and people-loving politics of the Party for three decades.
					
					 The officials and employees of the bureau built dozens of commercial and catering establishments and mass-produced popular and famous goods, thus contributing to implementing the Party's intention to provide the people with tasty and nutritious foodstuffs.
					
					 A meeting took place on Saturday.
					
					 Attending it were An Jong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials and employees of the bureau.

articles.title: Officials of Trade Union Organizations Make Study Tour of Area of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Officials of Trade Union Organizations Make Study Tour of Area of Mt Paektu
 Hyesan, August 26 (KCNA) -- Officials of the trade union organizations across the country made a study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu on Aug. 20-26 on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung in Pochonbo and paid tribute to him.
					
					 After being briefed on the battle, they went round the command post of the battle, post office, sub-county office, fire hall, etc.
					
					 After passing through the Spring Site in Poso-ri, the tableland of Junghung, they went round the Samjiyon Grand Monument, subsidiary theme sculptures and revolutionary relics along the shore of Lake Samji.
					
					 They looked round various places at the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station.
					
					 After touring the revolutionary battle sites including the Sinsadong Revolutionary Battle Site and Monument to the Victorious Battle of the Musan Area, they climbed up Mt Paektu.
					
					 They went round the historic relics at leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp before meeting to vow. 
					
					 They visited the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site and Chongbong and Konchang bivouacs.
					
					 They went round Samjiyon County Town where remarkable changes are taking place, and held colorful political and cultural work such as a meeting to hear impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas and a question-and-answer study contest during their tour.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued new stamps (an individual stamp and a sheet) depicting Ryomyong Street built as a model and standard of the Juche-oriented and modern architecture.
					 The individual stamp shows a panoramic view of the street where multi-storied and skyscraping apartment houses stand in good harmony.
					
					 The sheet pictures a nocturnal view of the street, including the 70-storied apartment house.
					
					 Ryomyong Street is a monumental edifice of the Mallima era, which was built for nine months by the indomitable spirit of the army and people of the DPRK and the unfathomable strength of self-reliance and self-development.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il and Songun Politics
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il and Songun Politics 
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said that Songun (military first) was the revolutionary idea and practice of leader Kim Jong Il and his political idea and mode.
					 It means the Songun idea and politics are the revolutionary idea that can be called by relating to his august name only and the basic socialist political mode of Kim Jong Il style.
					
					 The world political history does not know the word Songun. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated and systemized President Kim Il Sung's idea of attaching importance to the army and the military affairs as the Songun revolutionary idea and developed it in depth.
					
					 He enforced a fresh and unique politics, the Songun politics, when the U.S. became all the more pronounced in its moves for suffocating the DPRK advancing along the road of socialism in the mid-1990s.
					
					 The Songun politics is the basic political mode under socialism which helps place military affairs before everything on the principle of attaching importance to arms and prioritizing military affairs, and advance the socialist cause victoriously with the Korean People's Army (KPA) as the core and main force.
					
					 On this basis, he established the new state machinery with the National Defence Commission as its pivot and solved all the issues in the revolution and construction on the principle of prioritizing military affairs.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics, the DPRK's single-minded unity and great army-people unity were successfully carried out to consolidate the political and ideological position of the revolution in every way.
					
					 The KPA made a series of successes in the showdown with the U.S. and the socialist economic construction as the standard-bearer and vanguard.
					
					 Indeed, Songun associated with his whole life is independence, dignity and the immortal banner for final victory in the building of a socialist power.

articles.title: Freight Transportation Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Freight Transportation Increases in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Employees of the Ministry of Railways of the DPRK have increased freight transportation with the will to mercilessly smash despicable sanctions of the U.S. imperialists and hostile forces in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					 According to data available, they fulfilled their transportation plan at 109.3 percent after the statement of the DPRK government was reported.
					
					 Those of the Pyongyang Railway Bureau increased the running rate of electric locomotives to the maximum and made successes in transportation of coal, cement and other freights needed for building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 The Chongjin and the Rason railway bureaus also carried out their daily freight transportation plans at 103.3 percent and 140.7 percent. 
					
					 Their achievements greatly encouraged the working people who are speeding up the great Mallima advance, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: Final Victory Belongs to DPRK in Showdown with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Final Victory Belongs to DPRK in Showdown with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article that the Day of Songun is a significant day of great importance in the Korean history of building revolutionary armed forces and a prosperous country together with the day of army building.
					 The article refers to the fact that the road of Songun revolutionary leadership covered by leader Kim Jong Il was rigorous years beset with unprecedented events and manifold trials. 
					
					 In those years he boldly weathered all sorts of difficulties and trials under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 It stresses that today the Songun revolutionary cause of the Workers' Party of Korea is being successfully carried forward by respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un has smashed every vicious move of the hostile forces to stifle the DPRK with the treasured sword of Songun.
					
					 Kim Jong Un advanced the unique line of simultaneously developing the two fronts on the basis of analyzing with deep insight the geopolitical character of the Korean peninsula, law-governed requirements of the developing Korean revolution and tendency of the change and development of the world political situation and wisely led the struggle for realizing it. He has turned the DPRK into the matchless nuclear weapons state in a short span of time.
					
					 If Kim Jong Un had not firmly consolidated the arsenal of the Songun revolution with his courage and pluck of Mt Paektu, far-sighted wisdom and outstanding leadership, a nuclear war would have broken out on this land more than a hundred times.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are now staging frantic Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises but these saber-rattling is little short of their muscle flexing for covering their uneasiness and fear they feel in face of the DPRK's daily increasing might.
					
					 No adversity, however, can ever block the dynamic advance of Songun Korea full of conviction under the guidance of Kim Jong Un and a final victory belongs to the DPRK in the showdown with the U.S.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Brass Hats' Junkets to South Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Brass Hats' Junkets to South Korea
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms the large-scale Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces on August 21 bellicose moves wrecking peace and stability of the Korean peninsula and other parts of Northeast Asia and increasing the danger of the outbreak of a nuclear war.
					 What matters is the fact that brass hats of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces visited south Korea one after another ahead of the joint military drills, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The visiting brass hats went busy, observing the joint military drills and reconfirming the "commitment to defense." They were closeted with south Korean lackeys including the puppet minister of Defense and the chief of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of south Korea in a bid to intensify cooperation for igniting a war against the north.
					
					 This proves that their junkets were aimed to supervise the war rehearsal on the spot and ignite a war against the DPRK any moment.
					
					 The worst-ever danger is prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the hysteric war moves of the U.S.
					
					 The junkets against this backdrop only added fuel to the tensions.
					
					Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could unilaterally pose nuclear threat to the DPRK. The U.S. should get rid of the old way of thinking that its mainland is safe and death is only for others though a war breaks out.
					
					 The U.S. was so foolish as to urgently dispatch its brass hats to south Korea and incite the atmosphere of war in a bid to test the determination and will of the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Incite War Hysteria
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Incite War Hysteria
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- South Korean warmongers incited war hysteria on the five islands in the hotspot waters of the West Sea of Korea on August 22 and 23, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The south Korean puppet navy mobilized various warships to get busy with a transport drill with the maritime police.
					
					 The puppet navy and the police staged a drill for urgently dispatching personnel of the marine corps to Yonphyong Island by high-speed landing craft from Inchon.
					
					 A drill for transporting the inhabitants of the islands in terror-ridden atmosphere was also staged.
					
					 Evacuation drills were simultaneously staged on the five islands next day.

articles.title: S. Korean Unionists Urge Authorities to Take Measure for Improvement of Treatment
articles.content:
S. Korean Unionists Urge Authorities to Take Measure for Improvement of Treatment
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online paper Voice of People, the staff of the Ministry of Employment and Labor belonging to the Public Solidarity Labor Union recently held a meeting before Chongwadae strongly demanding the authorities improve their treatment.
					 The participants warned that if the authorities do not take a measure for improving their treatment until Aug. 25, they would wage an indefinite hunger sit-in strike.

articles.title: S. Korean Civic Bodies Blast North-targeted Joint Military Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Civic Bodies Blast North-targeted Joint Military Drill
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and other civic organizations in Taejon, south Korea held a news conference in front of the city office on Aug. 21, condemning U.S. imperialists and the puppet regime for waging Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill in order to drive the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war, according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 The organizations issued a press release.
					
					 The press release denounced the authorities for turning down the demand for peace and reconciliation and choosing the confrontation and tensions, adding that the Korean peninsula has become a region in which a war may break out with ultra-modern weapons involved.

articles.title: Korean People Always Win in Confrontation with U.S.: Peruvian Figure
articles.content:
Korean People Always Win in Confrontation with U.S.: Peruvian Figure
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The Korean people will always win victory in the standoff with the U.S. as before as they are equipped with the Juche idea and confident about the justice of their cause
					 Victor Oliva Miguel, general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, said this in a statement on Aug. 15. The statement went on:
					
					 We extend firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in the struggle for protecting national sovereignty and prestige, smashing the U.S. moves.
					
					 The arrogant U.S. imperialists are extremely escalating the tensions on the Korean peninsula by further ratcheting up politico-military pressure, threat and sanctions against socialist Korea, far from drawing a lesson from its bitter defeat in the past Korean war.
					
					 The Korean people would not yield to the U.S. military threat and sanctions.
					
					 Although not big in its territory, the DPRK is a dignified nuclear power which the U.S. dares not provoke since the former is a power of independence where all the service personnel and people have been firmly united around the leader with one ideology and will.
					
					 We are convinced that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people are sure to win as they are dynamically advancing while foiling the moves to ignite a new war by the U.S., engrossed in high-handed and arbitrary practices on the international arena while dreaming of wild dream to dominate the world.
					
					A final victory belongs to the WPK and the Korean people.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Deceptive "Peace" Rhetoric Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Deceptive "Peace" Rhetoric Flailed
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Dr. Ri Jong Gwon, researcher of the National Reunification Institute, issued an article titled "Deceptive 'peace' rhetoric will invite horrible disaster of war and self-destruction".
					 The article enumerated thoughtless acts of the south Korean chief executive who trumpets about "peace" every day.
					
					 What matters is that the present south Korean chief executive is letting out the rhetoric as if he is an "apostle of peace" but in fact he is aboard the nuclear war chariot for aggression of the north driven by the U.S., the article noted, and went on:
					
					 Under the present situation, the "peace" rhetoric touted by the south Korean authorities is no more than a smokescreen to cover up the U.S. war hysteria, and a veil to conceal their sinister intention to bring down the DPRK with the backing of the U.S.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clearly understand that their deceptive "peace" rhetoric is a foolish act of inviting self-destruction.
					
					 If they truly stand for peace, it should think what genuine peace on the Korean peninsula has to be and where lies the way of settling it from the stand of prioritizing the nation.
					
					 They should not try to deceive the public at home and abroad with the sugar-coated "peace" rhetoric but find a way-out in getting themselves rid of the U.S. yoke.
					
					 The "strategy for existence" to avert a horrible war also lies in implementing the north-south joint declaration with sincere attitude and stand, by pooling efforts in the idea of By Our Nation Itself, away from sycophancy and submission to the U.S., not in "tightening south Korea-U.S. alliance".
					
					 The way of ensuring "the supreme national interests" lies in discerning who is the partner with whom they can join hands and bring about  independent reunification and peace and prosperity, and in solving all issues in the line of the people's requirements and nation's interests, not in staying under the U.S. master's "nuclear umbrella".
					
					 The present situation on the Korean peninsula where the danger of war is created demands the south Korean authorities make a proper policy decision at the crossroads of peace or war.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Russia
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's feats were held by the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee and the Vladivostok City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on August 15 and 21 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his visit to the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation.
					 On display at the venues of events were works of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and books introducing the DPRK.
					
					 The first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that the Korean people could firmly safeguard the gains of socialism resolutely confronting the U.S. under the present harsh situation thanks to the Songun feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The secretary in charge of ideology said that Kim Jong Il transformed the DPRK into a socialist country developing on its own efforts under any harsh circumstances and trained the Korean people as the heroic people making a contribution to the country's prosperity with sincere efforts.
					
					 The first secretary of the Vladivostok City Committee noted that the greatest feat performed by the greatest man Kim Jong Il before the country and its people is that he demonstrated the dignity of the DPRK before the world with his invincible Songun politics. 
					
					 He lauded Kim Jong Il for developing the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung into the everlasting guiding idea in the era of independence, adding that Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to the development of the traditional Russia-DPRK friendly relations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige la competencia de tropas especiales del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige la competencia de tropas especiales del EPC
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 57o aniversario del inicio de la orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, tuvo lugar la competencia de ataque a blancos de las unidades de operacion especial del Ejercito Popular de Corea para la ocupacion de islas.
					La dirigio el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					Le acogieron en el campo de entrenamiento el vicemariscal del EPC Ri Myong Su, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Yong Gil, primer subjefe y director general de Operaciones del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Jong Chon, director de Artilleria del EPC, y otros comandantes del EPC.
					
					Tras escuchar en el puesto de vigilancia el plan de realizacion de la competencia y recorrer las unidades de operacion especial que ocupaban la posicion de ataque, el Comandante Supremo dio la orden de iniciar la competencia.
					
					A las ordenes de despegue, los aviones militares golpearon duro por turno los blancos enemigos.
					
					Acto seguido, los lanzacohetes reactivos y los canones obus autopropulsados de distintos calibres abrieron simultaneamente el fuego contra las simuladas islas Paekryong y Taeyonphyong.
					
					Comenzo el combate de ocupacion de las islas de las tropas especiales.
					
					Propinaron la lluvia de balas contra los enemigos los comandos aterrizados en los blancos enemigos desde los aviones ligeros de transporte, que volaban a ras de tierra, y los otros infiltrados sigilosamente por via submarina.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, los combatientes a bordo de lanchas de goma realizaron el desembarco sorpresivo en la posicion enemiga.
					
					Ellos eliminaron totalmente a los enemigos, que oponian la resistencia, usando varios metodos de accion en combate.
					
					Repercutieron las vivas de victoria cuando se envolvieron en llamas en un instante los objetivos enemigos como el cuartel general de 6a brigada de marina y el de la unidad de defensa de la isla Yonphyong, desplegados en la isla Paekryong y la Taeyonphyong.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho por la exitosa marcha de la competencia.
					
					Diciendo que es muy buena la moral de los oficiales y soldados de las unidades de operacion especial, evaluo que la organizacion de combate y la direccion de ejercicio se llevaron a cabo de modo practico segun la orientacion del partido de producir gran viraje en el entrenamiento.
					
					Lo bueno de esta competencia es la superacion del formalismo en el ejercicio y su realizacion diversificada y multilateral, dijo e instruyo que los oficiales y soldados de las unidades deben intensificar el ejercicio por tipos de armas y especialidades y el conjunto esforzandose por mejorar su calidad.
					
					Al organizar en el futuro muchos ejercicios de combate para completar la cooperacion entre diferentes tipos de ejercito y especialidades militares, el EPC ha de incrementar considerablemente su capacidad combativa para poder enfrentarse a cualquier tipo de espacio operacional y circunstancia de combate, apunto. De esa manera, debe destruir por completo los bastiones de agresion de los enemigos, una vez dada la orden de ataque, indico.
					
					El EPC debe mantener con firmeza el temperamento ideo-politico propio de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, que no puede tener ningun ejercito de otro pais, y pensar en ocupar Seul de un tiron y todo el territorio surcoreano aniquilando sin piedad a los enemigos con los fusiles, destaco.
					
					Agrego que hace falta movilizar a los oficiales y soldados a la lucha por cumplir la meta de construccion de fuerzas armadas que debe alcanzar el EPC.
					
					Finalizada la competencia, el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC publico el ranking de competidores.

articles.title: Portavoz del Consejo de Religiosos de Corea condena "informe de religion" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz del Consejo de Religiosos de Corea condena "informe de religion" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias, EE.UU. divulga ampliamente el rumor intrigante contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tras definirla de nuevo en el llamado "informe internacional de libertad religiosa de 2016" como "pais que causa preocupacion especial" que viola severamente la "libertad de religion", el portavoz del Consejo de Religiosos de Corea publico el dia 26 una declaracion que sigue:
					En su llamado "informe", EE.UU. planteo su absurdo criterio de que aunque la Constitucion de la RPDC estipula garantizar la "libertad de religion", esta no hay en realidad y las actividades religiosas son castigadas duro. Ademas, ese pais calumnio brutalmente a la RPDC aduciendo los tergiversados datos de investigacion de varios aparatos fabricados por si mismo.
					
					Rechazamos totalmente tal calumnia considerandola como el climax de invento y fraude que no valen nada.
					
					Durante la pasada guerra coreana, EE.UU. cometio el crimen nunca perdonable de destruir con sus bombardeos salvajes muchas instalaciones religiosas, inclusive mas de 1,900 iglesias y ermitas, y matar a cientos de miles de religiosos inocentes.
					
					Las barbaridades de ese tipo continuan hoy dia por doquier del mundo. 
					
					En estos momentos tambien, numerosos religiosos pierden la vida y sus tierras sagradas de larga historia se reducen a cenizas y escombros debido al indiscriminado ataque aereo de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas.
					
					Esto es el panorama real de la "libertad religiosa" que preconiza tanto EE.UU.
					
					Su insistencia en el inexistente "problema de religion" del Norte de Corea no es mas que el esfuerzo agonico para manchar la imagen exterior y la posicion estrategica de la RPDC, que avanza siempre con la bandera de independencia antiyanqui en alto, y fomentar al maximo el ambiente de sancion y presion contra ella.
					
					En lo adelante tambien, el CRC hara frente rotundo a las arbitrariedades y politica hostil anticoreana de EE.UU. solidarizandose con las entidades religiosas internacionales.

articles.title: Investigador del IRP desmiente la "paz" aludida por autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Investigador del IRP desmiente la "paz" aludida por autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- El investigador del Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP), Dr. Ri Jong Gwon, publico el dia 25 el articulo titulado "El enganoso canturreo de la ´paz´ no dara otro resultado que el desastre de guerra y la autodestruccion".
					  Por estos dias, el mandatario surcoreano habla tanto de la supuesta "paz" como si fuera el "apostol de paz", comienza el autor y continua:
					
					  Pero, lo que hace el en realidad es conducir la maquinaria de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC cuyas riendas las lleva EE.UU.
					
					  En las circunstancias actuales, el canturreo de "paz" de las autoridades surcoreanas no pasa de ser una cortina de humo para ocultar la fiebre belica de EE.UU. y la siniestra intencion de ellas mismas de atacar a la RPDC con la ayuda de su patron gringo.
					
					  Ellas deben conocer bien que su enganoso reclamo por la "paz" es una tonteria que se busca la autodestruccion.
					
					  Si desean de veras la paz, deberan pensar seriamente, desde la firme posicion nacional, cual es la paz verdadera de la Peninsula Coreana y donde esta el remedio para lograrla.
					
					  En lugar de tratar de enganar la opinion publica interna y externa con su exigencia superficial sobre la "paz", deberan buscar el medio por su salvacion liberandose del yugo norteamericano.
					
					  La "estrategia de supervivencia" para evitar la guerra catastrofica tampoco esta en "fortalecer la alianza Sudcorea-EE.UU.", sino en implementar la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur con la actitud sincera separandose del servilismo y sumision a EE.UU. y unificando las voluntades conforme al ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					  La manera de asegurar los "intereses estatales prioritarios" no es escudarse bajo el "paraguas nuclear" del amo gringo, sino resolver todos los problemas segun la demanda de la opinion publica y los intereses nacionales luego de distinguir bien con quien debe tomar la mano para forjar el futuro de reunificacion independiente, paz y prosperidad.
					
					  La situacion actual de la Peninsula Coreana, donde se ha creado la crisis de guerra a punto de explosion, exige a las autoridades surcoreanas tomar la correcta decision politica ante el dilema importante de la paz o la guerra.

articles.title: Emitidos en Corea nuevos sellos sobre avenida Ryomyong
articles.content:
Emitidos en Corea nuevos sellos sobre avenida Ryomyong
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- Fueron emitidos en Corea nuevos sellos (un sello individual y un papel enterizo de pequeno tamano) que presentan la avenida Ryomyong, modelo de la arquitectura contemporanea del Juche.
					El sello individual presenta el panorama de la avenida donde estan distribuidos en perfecta armonia los rascacielos y otros apartamentos de muchos pisos. 
					
					El papel enterizo muestra la vista nocturna de las construcciones de la avenida decoradas con luces electricas, inclusive el rascacielos de 70 pisos.
					
					La nueva creacion monumental de la epoca de Mallima fue completada en solo 9 meses gracias a la indoblegable fuerza espiritual de los uniformados y civiles coreanos y el inagotable poderio de autoconfianza.
